revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Proxim |model=AP-600 |revision=bg |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |availability= |type=access point |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |fcc_date=05/18/2003 |fcc_id=HZB-G11FNF,HZB-B11FNF,MCLJ07H06904,HZB-C38WCW,HZB-A13QBF |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=DIN |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC8241;MPC8241LZQ166D; |cpu1_cspeed=166 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=E28F640J3A-120 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432DH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |serial=DE-9 |jtag= |wi1_module=Proxim G11FNF |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5212A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5111 |wi1_chip3_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip3_model=AR2111 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |ant_conn=U.FL |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=ADMtek |eth_chip1_model=AN983B |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=My Wireless Network A |default_ssid_regex=^My Wireless Network A$ |default_ip=169.254.128.132 |default_user= |default_pass=public |oui=00:20:A6 |oui_eth=00:20:A6 }} {{TagLine|802.11a/b/g Wireless Access Point}}
These access points have three different models.. *[[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-600a|AP-600a]] (802.11a only), FCC ID: HZB-A13QBF, [[Atheros]] AR5001A module :[[Ambit Microsystems T60H677]] 802.11ab (??) *[[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-600b|AP-600b]] (802.11b only), FCC ID: HZB-B11FNF, ORiNOCO Ruby card *[[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-600|AP-600bg]] (802.11bg only), FCC ID: HZB-G11FNF, [[Atheros]] AR5001G module :[[Proxim G11FNF]] [[Atheros]] AR5001G 802.11bg
"P/N: 141310120002E REV: 02 MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the main board. :"J07H069.02 REV: 7" and "0307" (02/2003) is silkscreened on the module board. :*[[Ambit Microsystems J07H069.02]] ([[User:Omega/Board PN#Foxconn (+ Ambit Microsystems)|Foxconn]]) ::Module manufactured by [[Ambit]] / [[Foxconn]] / ''Hon Hai'' :Uses an uncommon combination of AR5212 + AR5111 + AR2111 for 802.11bg only. *There may also be an a/b/g version of this device (FCC ID: HZB-C38WCW). :"U59H007 REV: 1" and "0329" (07/2003) is silkscreened on the module board. :*[[Ambit Microsystems U59H007.01]] 802.11abg (??) U59H010.01 :*[[Ambit Microsystems J07H069.01]] 802.11abg (??) [[Proxim 8482-WD v1]] See also [[Foxconn Wireless Adapters]].. *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/proxim-orinoco-ap-600-80211-abg-access-point-148 On SpeedGuide.net] :To reset the unit to factory defaults hold the '''Reload''' button :for 10 seconds while the unit is running. :To erase the firmware and require reload via TFTP, hit '''Reset''' :while the unit is running and then hit '''Reload''' for 20 seconds.
==Images== <gallery> File:Proxim AP-600 board top.jpg|board top File:Proxim AP-600 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:Proxim AP-600 cpu.jpg|CPU shot </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
